special_text:
[+1]: Up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
[-2]: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature enters under your control, it gets +3/+3 and gains haste until end of turn.”
